title: Claude Code UI Service Deployment Failures
description: High operational issue: Claude Code UI service experiencing spawn errors 'Error: spawn claude ENOENT' and git repository path issues 'Project path not found: /workspace/agents'. WebSocket connection failures affecting real-time features. Service unable to locate Claude CLI binary. Root cause: Incorrect path configuration and missing Claude CLI binary in deployment environment. Prevention: Validate service dependencies and paths in deployment configuration. Implement health checks for all service dependencies.
